mapper.select: select rent.bnum, member.userid, member.name, book.book_id, book.book_name, rent.aday, rent.bday from member, book, rent where member.userid=rent.userid and book.book_id=rent.book_id and member.userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: insert into rent(bnum, userid, book_id) values (rent_seq.nextval, #{userid}, #{book_id})
